name: 林鈞陶
objective:
本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習通訊與訊號處理工程領域之最新科技，受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗。
The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of Communications and Signal Processing Engineering. Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.
schedule: 每週 1 次演講，每週都須於課堂上繳交心得報告
scorePolicy: 出席率與報告品質，另有加分機制。
consultation: 請與助教或老師聯繫另約時間
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
